info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 11:24AM MST until August 02 at 12:15PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Mohave County in northwestern Arizona... * Until 1215 PM MST. * At 1122 AM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Chloride, or 14 miles northwest of Kingman, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs and trees. Strong winds along Highway 93 moving southeast toward Golden Valley and Kingman. * Locations impacted include... Windy Point Campground, Packsaddle Campground, Chloride, New Kingman-Butler and Golden Valley. This includes the following roads... Highway 93 in Mohave County between mile markers 48 and 69. State Route 68 in Mohave County between mile markers 26 and 28. Stockton Hill Road between mile markers 7 and 18. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
